ModMetaData.name: Farmland Regrowth Compatibilitly Patch
ModMetaData.author: Aura
ModMetaData.description:
Just a small patch to make the farmlands from [LYN] Farmland's compatible with Regrowth Core's modified soil types.
Changes: Tillable (140%) soil: Arid Soil, Tundra Soil, Boreal Soil, Temperate Soil, Aspen Soil, Boiling Soil, Anima Soil, Fertile tillable (180%) soil: Tropical Soil, Enchanted Soil, Dry tillable (100%) soil: Vulcanic Rock, Hotspring Sand, Depleted (mossy) Soil, Depleted Gravel, Cracked Anima Soil, Anima Spring Sand,
